message.body: Welp, I just got your letter. And as much as I appreciate it, Jesus Christ, Blakslee!! You really put me in a real tough situation. Obviously I'm really hurting to dig myself out of a really deep hole financially, but I would feel horrible accepting something like that. That's nutz.
It's not open for discussion. Friends look out for each other.
But that's just soo much! It would help tremendously but I would feel horrible. I'm kinda in a bind with this decision. Thank you so so much tho!
Santana, I know that if you could, you would do the same for your friends. Let me help you on this one. Consider it 7 years worth of birthday gifts I nev
